[=] GUIDEWIRE EDUCATION Y/

Preparing for a Guidewire Exam

Lesson objectives

By the end of this lesson, you will be able to:

* Open-book exams
« Understand how to prepare for a Guidewire open-book exam
« Develop appropriate expectations for the open-book exam experience
« Understand what resources are available for use during the open-book exam

* Closed-book/Proctored exams
« Understand how to prepare for a Guidewire proctored exam
« Develop appropriate expectations for the proctored exam experience

LE GUIDEWIRE EDUCATION __cuidewire Proprietary & Confidential ~D0 NOT DISTRIBUTE ©2020 Guidewire Software, Inc. Fr information about Gudewie'strademars, vst hte: /euidewir.comylgal-notces. Page 2

Open-book Exams

Which InsuranceSuite exams are open-book?

* Certification Prerequisite - InsuranceSuite 10.0 Fundamentals — EXAM
* Specialist Certification - BillingCenter 10.0 Configuration —- EXAM
* Specialist Certification - ClaimCenter 10.0 Configuration —- EXAM
* Specialist Certification - PolicyCenter 10.0 Configuration —- EXAM

Specialist Certification - InsuranceSuite 10.0 Integration - EXAM

See Developer Certification Paths, in the Certification Options section of
http://education.guidewire.com

LE GUIDEWIRE EDUCATION __cuidewire Proprietary & Confidential ~D0 NOT DISTRIBUTE ©2020 Guidewire Software, Inc. Fr information about Gudewie'strademars, vst hte: /euidewir.comylgal-notces.

How should you prepare for an open-book exam?

* Complete all the lessons in the courses required for the exam
* Course content
¢ Demonstrations
¢ Hands on lab exercises

¢ Familiarize yourself with supporting materials (available from your project team)
* Guidewire product documentation (available on Guidewire Community http://community.guidewire.com)
* Guidewire products and Guidewire Studio (available from your IT team)
« Product data dictionaries and security dictionary (available from your IT team)
« PCF References (available in your product installation)
« GOSU API Reference (available in your product installation)

* Review the Exam Considerations Section of InsuranceSuite Certification Options for
Developers for your exam on http://education.guidewire.com

LE GUIDEWIRE EDUCATION __cuidewire Proprietary & Confidential ~D0 NOT DISTRIBUTE ©2020 Guidewire Software, Inc. Fr information about Gudewie'strademars, vst hte: /euidewir.comylgal-notces. Page 5

What should you expect during the open-book exam?

* The exam will consist of 40-50 multiple choice questions.

* Questions may require use of the Open Book materials to successfully select the
correct answer(s).

¢ Learners, on average, spend 4 to 8 hours completing the exam.

Learners have 24 hours to complete an open-book Specialist or Fundamentals exam
once they begin.

¢ Learners are allowed to pause and restart their open-book exam multiple times
within their 24-hour exam window.

LE GUIDEWIRE EDUCATION __cuidewire Proprietary & Confidential ~D0 NOT DISTRIBUTE ©2020 Guidewire Software, Inc. Fr information about Gudewie'strademars, vst hte: /euidewir.comylgal-notces. Page 6

What resources can you use during the open-book exam?

* Guidewire course content (available on http://education.guidewire.com)
¢ Simulations in most Guidewire lessons

« Student Workbooks in each Guidewire course
* Guidewire product documentation (available on Guidewire Community)
* Guidewire products and Guidewire Studio (available from your IT team)
* Product data dictionaries and security dictionary (available from your IT team)
¢ PCF References (available in your product installation)

* GOSU API Reference (available in your product installation)

LE GUIDEWIRE EDUCATION __cuidewire Proprietary & Confidential ~D0 NOT DISTRIBUTE ©2020 Guidewire Software, Inc. Fr information about Gudewie'strademars, vst hte: /euidewir.comylgal-notces. Page 7

Proctored Exams

Which exams are closed-book/proctored?

* InsuranceSuite 10.0 Best Practices — EXAM

¢ Professional Certification - BillingCenter 10.0 Configuration - Proctored Exam
* Professional Certification - ClaimCenter 10.0 Configuration - Proctored Exam
* Professional Certification - PolicyCenter 10.0 Configuration - Proctored Exam

Professional Certification - InsuranceSuite 10.0 Integration - Proctored Exam

* See Developer Certification Paths, in the Certification Options section of
http://education.guidewire.com

LE GUIDEWIRE EDUCATION __cuidewire Proprietary & Confidential ~D0 NOT DISTRIBUTE ©2020 Guidewire Software, Inc. Fr information about Gudewie'strademars, vst hte: /euidewir.comylgal-notces.

How should you prepare for a closed-book/proctored exam?

* Complete all the lessons in the relevant courses.
* Course content.
¢ Demonstrations.
¢ Hands on lab exercises.

* Review the Proctored Exam Guide in the Certification Options section for your exam
on http://education.guidewire.com.

* Enroll in the exam with your training coordinator or with edadmin@guidewire.com.
* Look for “Enrollment Confirmation” email from edadmin@guidewire.com

* Schedule to take the exam with our proctoring partner in advance.

* Identify a test taking space that complies with test taking requirements
« See the Proctored Exam Guide in the Certification Options section for your exam

LE GUIDEWIRE EDUCATION __cuidewire Proprietary & Confidential ~D0 NOT DISTRIBUTE ©2020 Guidewire Software, Inc. Fr information about Gudewie'strademars, vst hte: /euidewir.comylgal-notces. Page 10

What should you expect during the closed-book/proctored exam?

* The exam will consist of multiple-choice questions.
* The questions are written to determine your ability to apply your knowledge.

* The exam will be proctored online by our proctoring partner using your webcam and
audio (no headphones allowed).

* Examinees will be asked to show identification.
* The exam must be completed within 3 hours of starting, in one sitting

* The proctored exam should take approximately 2-3 hours to complete.

LE GUIDEWIRE EDUCATION __cuidewire Proprietary & Confidential ~D0 NOT DISTRIBUTE ©2020 Guidewire Software, Inc. Fr information about Gudewie'strademars, vst hte: /euidewir.comylgal-notces. Page 11

Lesson objectives review

You are now able to:
* Know which exams are open-book and which are closed-book/proctored

¢ Understand the difference between an open-book and proctored exam
* Understand what resources are available to use during an open-book exam
* Successfully prepare for a Guidewire exam

* Set successful expectations for taking a Guidewire exam

LE GUIDEWIRE EDUCATION __cuidewire Proprietary & Confidential ~D0 NOT DISTRIBUTE ©2020 Guidewire Software, Inc. Fr information about Gudewie'strademars, vst hte: /euidewir.comylgal-notces. Page 12,
